entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swa-be-prod.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swa-be-prod@sha256:508e31222892e5f524ae9c9da3df03db037c95ccea31466165bc7c1ce54dfd67+g' ./swa-be/release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml sed -i "s/creationTimestamp:.*/creationTimestamp: '2023-03-19T16:18:40Z'/" ./swa-be/release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./swa-be/release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: swa-be-prod:32' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master
